dmca.title: Notification of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: floris [mailto:info@vBulletin.nl] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2005 3:20 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: info@vBulletin.nl
Subject: Notification of Copyright Infringement

Dear sir, madam,

This email is to inform you of copyrighted material being distributed
unauthorized through a web site hosted on your network (host alias resolves
to an IP address which is owned by theplanet.com). My request is to remove
the infringement material and/or even suspend current and future and/or
associated account(s).

As per your requirements:

# A physical or electronic signature of a person ("Complaining Party")
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
claimed to be infringed.

Hereby I inform you that I am the author of various styles and therefor the
authorized party to request the my material to be removed as soon as
possible.

# Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or
if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site.

I've created the commercial style package vBulletin.nl Professional Style
Package 1.x for vBulletin version 3.0.x and have sold it to licensed
vBulletin customers. They have been notified prior to purchase that they are
not allowed to resell, lease, sublet or distribute the resource at any time.
The resource (until recently) was being sold through the unofficial
vBulletin fan web site www.vBulletin.nl

# Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be
the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to locate the material

My resources: 
http://2u43.cjb.net/vB/303-306/vBulletin-Fans.com_Style2.zip
http://2u43.cjb.net/vB/303-306/vBulletin-Fans.com_Style1.zip
and more importantly: 
http://2u43.cjb.net/vB/303-306/Pro%20Style%5bvb.nl%5d.zip

Note: the host 2u43.cjb.net is a host alias that resolves to the IP address:
67.19.214.195
Note: the IP address 67.19.214.195 reverse resolves to the Host address:
195.67-19-214.reverse.theplanet.com

# Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted

My name is Floris Fiedeldij Dop, author of the above vBulletin styles and
you can contact me on  info@vBulletin.nl

# A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law; and 

Yes, I have never given permission to distribute my copyrighted material
over the internet. It is a warez release and piracy is not tolerated.

# A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed

The information is as accurate as it is provided to me, I am sure
theplanet.com itself isn't aware of the files being hosted on their server,
but I request their assistance to enforce their anti piracy policy upon the
user who is aware of distributing my resources unauthorized.


To avoid abuse I hope my privacy is respected by theplanet.com and won't
forward my contact details to the party in question.


Thank you,
Floris Fiedeldij Dop
info@vBulletin.nl
